name: Chinbu's Adventure
description:
A collectathon action rpg where you play as a young dragon named Chinbu with the unique ability to control all elements.

Features

  • Customize your dragon
  • Collect gems hidden across the map (Collectathon)
  • Explore a large island
  • Fight aggressive animals
  • Dodging
  • Swimming/Flying (Limited by stamina)
  • Active/Passive Skills such as Health Regen and Fireball
